pages.title: Redtail Catfish
pages.text: The redtail catfish, Phractocephalus hemioliopterus, is a pimelodid ($(o)long-whiskered$()) catfish.$(br2)In Venezuela, it is known as cajaro, and in Brazil, it is known as pirarara, stemming from the Tupi language words pirá and arara.$(br2)It is the only extant species of the genus Phractocephalus.

pages.title: Redtail Catfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)2 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
